description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Up to 4 player, twin stick shooter. How long can you survive against wave after wave of Zombies...? Who’s the sharpest shooter! Who’s got what it takes to get the high score!
description.short: Up to 4 player, twin stick shooter. How long can you survive against wave after wave of Zombies...? Who’s the sharpest shooter! Who’s got what it takes to get the high score!
